first_para: Jonathan Peter Evans FRSA (born 2 June 1950) is a Welsh Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cardiff North since between the 2010 general election and the dissolution of the 55th Parliament on 30 March 2015, when he stood down at the general election in 2015. In April 2015 he became non-executive chairman of Allied World Managing Agency.

full.extract:
Jonathan Peter Evans FRSA (born 2 June 1950) is a Welsh Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cardiff North since between the 2010 general election and the dissolution of the 55th Parliament on 30 March 2015, when he stood down at the general election in 2015. In April 2015 he became non-executive chairman of Allied World Managing Agency.
After training as a solicitor, he was the Conservative Member of Parliament for Brecon and Radnorshire between 1992 and 1997, and then Member of the European Parliament for Wales between 1999 and 2009.
full.title: Jonathan Evans (politician)
